醟字的基本解释

醟
yòng
酗酒。

醟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yòng］
［《廣韻》爲命切，去映，云。］
［《廣韻》休正切，去勁，曉。］
(1)酗酒。
(2)淫乱。
(3)贝名。参见“醟貝”。

醟字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醟； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1286第17
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?爲命切，音詠。【說文】䣱也。【徐曰】酒失也。【玉篇】酗也。【韻會】小人飮酒，一醉日富。以飮酒爲榮也，故从。【抱朴子·論僊卷】酗醟者，不可非杜儀之爲酒。【梁武帝檄】淫酗醟肆，酣歌壚邸。　又【字彙補】貝名。【相貝經】有醟貝。　又【廣韻】休正切【集韻】虛政切，?音夐。義同。　又【韻會】【正韻】?于營切，音榮。【前漢·景十三王敘傳贊】魯恭館室，江都訬輕。趙敬險詖，中山淫醟。【註】師古讀合韻，音榮。

醟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
醟字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
醟
yòng
alcoholism.
醟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yòng］
["Guangyun" is fate, go to Ying, cloud. ]
["Guangyun" Shut Tangent, Go Jin, Xiao. ]
(1) Alcoholism.
(2) Fornication.
(3) Shell name. See "Mao Bei".
醟
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醟; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1286 Page 17
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? For life, chanting. [Said the text] You also. [Xu Yue] I lost my wine. [Jade articles] Abuse too. [Rhyme Club] The villain gets a drink, gets drunk and gets rich every day. It's also proud to be savory, so it is from . [Baopuzi·Lunxianjuan] For those who are addicted to spirits, Du Yizhi must be the wine. [Liang Wu Di Xia] lewd and mad, sung song and lofty mansion.　[Words complement] shell name. 【Phase Shell Scripture】There are scallops.　[Guang Yun] Xiu Zhengqi [Ji Yun] Xu Zhengqi,? Yin Qu. The same meaning.　[Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Yu Yingqie, Yinrong. [Previous Han·Jing Thirteen Kings Xu Chuan Zan] Lu Gong's room, Jiangdu Xuqing. Zhao Jing is dangerous, and Zhongshan is yummy. [Note] The teacher's ancient reading together rhyme, the sound is Rong.
